__For a particular kind of insulating material, life can be described by the inverse power model__
$$
\Pr[T \leq t;\mathtt{volt}] = \Phi_{_{SEV}}\left[\frac{\log(t)-\mu}{\sigma} \right]
$$
__where $\sigma$ is constant, $\mu = \beta_{0}+ \beta_{1} x$, and $x=\log(\mathtt{volt})$.__

a. __Show that  $\log(t_{p})$, the logarithm of the Weibull quantile, is a linear function of $\log(\mathtt{volt})$.__
